Text: Trying this again, didn't work the first time.  This is the first torrent I've created and seeded.  I'm having a problem with uTorrent adding the .loaded extension to the end of my torrent file, which is preventing me from choosing the file as a torrent since it has the wrong extension.  I tried copying the file and removing the .loaded from the file name, then pointing at the copied file.  I don't know if this is going to work.  Any ideas?  I'm going to seed this for at least a few days from right now, and if I stop, I'll post a comment here.

I've stopped trying to seed this file because it wasn't working.  I think I got it working now though and I created a new torrent called "This American Life - Complete Volume 1995-2007 - Episodes 1-342.torrent"  Try that one.  Sorry about all the bogus torrents.
